input.sentences: flying on a jet plane to a new city .
a city filled with amazing sights .
sometimes things can be a little boring .
sometimes there are things about a new city that make you want to scream .
the best part of a trip sometimes is heading back home .
output.sentences: My husband and I flew on a plane for our vacation.
We visited many famous buildings and landmarks.
Later, we went to a club and met some locals.
While watching TV, we cheered for our favorite sports teams.
As we walked home, I held my husband's hand, happy to be with him.
